data.scheme_name: MSME Sustainable (ZED) Certification Scheme 2022  - Female  - Micro  - Existing
data.benefits: Scheme provides 90% subsidy for obtaining for a ZED Certification Level for micro  units.
data.eligibility: All existing micro registered with the UDYAM registration portal (of the MoMSME) will be eligible to participate under this scheme
data.conditions:
• The applicant will have to apply afresh after expiry of the certificate as per the validity of the scheme. 
  • The Cost of Certification are as follows : 
  1. Certification Level 1 Bronze : Rs. 0.08 lakh 
  2. Certification Level 2 Silver : Rs. 0.32 lakh 
  3. Certification Level 3 Gold : Rs. 0.72 lakh
data.beneficiaries: All existing micro registered with the UDYAM registration portal (of the MoMSME) will be eligible to participate under this scheme
data.prerequisites:
• The applicant will have to apply afresh after expiry of the certificate as per the validity of the scheme. 
  • The Cost of Certification are as follows : 
  1. Certification Level 1 Bronze : Rs. 0.08 lakh 
  2. Certification Level 2 Silver : Rs. 0.32 lakh 
  3. Certification Level 3 Gold : Rs. 0.72 lakh
data.nodal_agency: Ministry of Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises
data.context: This scheme is introduced to to create awareness amongst MSMEs about Zero Defect Zero Effect (ZED) practices and motivate & incentivise them for ZED Certification while also encouraging them to become MSME Champions.
data.objective: The main aim is to Increase public awareness on demanding Zero Defect and Zero Effect products through the MSME Sustainable (ZED) Certification.
data.description:
1. Scheme provides 90% subsidy for obtaining for a ZED Certification Level. 
  2. Financial Assistance in Testing/Quality/Product Certification : Up to 75% of the total cost of Testing/Certification, with the maximum ceiling of subsidy being Rs. 0.50 lakh. 
  3. Handholding Support : Up to Rs. 2 lakh  for consultancy for all ZED certified MSMEs. 
  4. Support in Technology Upgradation for Zero Effect Solutions : Up to Rs. 3 lakh for all ZED certified MSMEs.
data.how_to_apply: The applicant can apply through the link : https://loginzed.msme.gov.in/Msme/Login
data.funding_facilitator: Ministry of MSME and State governments
data.funding_mechanism: The assistance will be released after the certification level.
data.faq: FAQs | ZED  - Zero Defect Zero Effect
data.additional_info: The certificate will be valid for a period of 3 years
data.checklist_info_a:
Udyam Registration Number of the Enterprise
Mobile Number that is associated with the Udyam Registration
Valid Email ID (Login credentials and information/document will be sent on the Unit Email ID)
data.checklist_info_d:
Address : Ministry of Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises Udyog Bhawan, Rafi Marg, New Delhi - 110011, India
Ph. No. : 9773770346
Email ID : zed@qcin.org
data.beneficiary: Manufacturing Industry  - All Entities  - All Locations  - Micro
data.lifecycle: Establishment of brand and enhance quality output
